title: IZOD Men's Denim Jeans - Comfort Stretch Mid Rise Relaxed Fit Jeans for Men - Classic Men's Cotton 5 Pocket Denim Pants
description: IZOD QUALITY: Wear the brand that lasts. With over 75 years of experience with premium quality clothing, Izod is the brand of choice for those who demand the pinnacle of style in their everyday wear
CLASSIC STYLING: The Izod Men’s Comfort Stretch Relaxed Fit jean features the timeless five pocket design for a look that shines at the restaurant, work, or at home among family and friends

COMFORT STRETCH: Made with blue stretchy denim fabric, these pants are the perfect gift for men who want jeans to fit them instead of fitting into slim skinny jeans; like stretch pants, they move and flex with you

RELAXED FIT: Izod Relaxed Fit means a laid back, comfortable feel without sacrificing shape; extra fabric in the seat, expanded leg openings, and a standard waist fit make this pant a go-to favorite. Also available in Regular and Straight fit
MACHINE WASH: Machine washable blend retains its perfect shape & fitted appearance for work & everyday casual. 98% Cotton, 2% Spandex

IZOD Men's Denim Jeans offer a perfect blend of comfort, style, and durability, making them a staple in every wardrobe. These mid-rise relaxed fit jeans for men are designed with your comfort in mind, featuring a cotton blend with added stretch for ease of movement. Whether you're running errands, heading to the office, or resting on the weekend, these men's jeans provide all-day wearability without sacrificing style. With a classic 5-pocket design, these mens relaxed fit jeans offer both practicality and timeless appeal. The relaxed fit through the seat and thighs ensures plenty of room for movement, while the durable denim fabric stands up to your active lifestyle. Ideal for both casual outings and more rugged use, these work jeans for men are versatile enough to transition seamlessly from day to night. Available in a classic blue wash, these men's blue jeans offer endless styling possibilities, making them the perfect addition to your wardrobe. Whether you're searching for pantalones de hombre or denim pants for men, IZOD delivers with comfortable, relaxed fit jeans for men who prioritize both form and function.
